archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.2.3: System/network availability (i.e. response and up-time) should be measured from the perspective of business users (e.g. by monitoring system and network performance).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
